column2: <c=@abilitytype>Kneel.</c> Fire a bullet that grants you boons and inflicts conditions on your target.
Boosts aetherium production by 5%% for ten minutes in exchange for 1000 influence.
New World vs. World Opinion Poll!
<c=@abilitytype>Dual Attack</c> skills weaken enemies. Attacks against weakened foes have increased critical chance.
Adds a 20%% magic-find bonus to the boons applies by the guild's aura around claimed objectives.
Simplified nameplates will not apply to anyone.
Show remaining health percent on the health bar of your target.

Usable by any character, these items will help you blend in with the White Mantle. This pack is valued at 2675 gems.

Appearance skins override the look of your equipment and have no stats of their own.
Must be covered in chak goop.
<c=@abilitytype>Cantrip.</c> Transfer your conditions to your marked target and then heal yourself.

Hitting your marked target with a stolen skill grants boons to allies around your mark and to allies around you.
Cannot grant boons to the same ally more than once per activation.
Trade with Scavenger Rakatin in Auric Basin to acquire a piece of Polished Aurillium and use it to capture the tormented energies of the Twisted Castle.
Improper arena entry detected; you have been teleported to the arena exit.
<c=@abilitytype>Cantrip.</c> Knock away nearby foes with a burst of shadow magic, then stealth yourself. If this skill hits your marked target, they'll be launched instead.
<c=@abilitytype>Kneel.</c> Create a barrier of shadows that blocks incoming missiles.
Cairn the Indomitable becomes vulnerable to attack.

Kryta's troubles are many, reaching back to antiquity. It's fortunate for our nation that we have heroes such as you, willing to stand against villains.

In recent days, there has been a gathering whisper in the darkness, a marshaling of forces. The orders you intercepted allowed us to take the fight to them, and for that I'm grateful.

Should you find any further enemy communications in the field, bring them to me that we might keep a shining light upon evil.

â€”Ralan
<c=@abilitytype>Dual Attack.</c> Cover yourself in an increasing barrier while dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Simplified nameplates will only apply to enemy players in World vs. World.
Become immobile and gain access to kneel skills, which have increased projectile velocity. You can still dodge roll while kneeling. Kneel is canceled if you swap weapons or become disabled.
Boosts aetherium production by 5%% for one minute in exchange for 100 influence.
-Control capture points to earn a large amount of points for your team.
